name: Project Hour
description:
Project Hour is a quick paced action shooter inspired by such games as Hotline Miami and Enter the Gungeon. Take the role of Michael Jackson's last clone while traveling throughout time & space in search for the truth and a way to save yourself from the evil grasps of Google before it is too late.

- 2D Action Shooter: Tough but fair combat, that relies on quick

moment to moment gameplay choices.

- Weapon Loadouts: Switch and swap between several different

weapons in the game to build your perfect loadout.

- Tight stream lined levels for players to fight through with lots of

replayability.

- Interesting gunplay with different features to master over the

course of the game.
